subject: Enable drawing focus border around widgets that received focus
commitMessage:
Enable drawing focus border around widgets that received focus

When focus is set for a widget, a border is drawn to show that it is
focused. Whether the border is drawn or not depends on the value of
a globalconfig variable - focus_highlight_enable.

Change-Id: Ie4e735b7a0268dc1cdabebe1c914187c16f06871
Signed-off-by: Agnieszka Janowicz <a.janowicz@partner.samsung.com>

comments.message:
